content: With the Goji Shoots Soak equipped, each use of the Gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Ring of Fire for a short duration
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Goji_Shoots.md', within the main section titled 'Goji Shoots'.
The content is as follows:
With the Goji Shoots Soak equipped, each use of the Gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Ring of Fire for a short duration
